name: Aoky (2D Platformer Act of Kindness)
description:
This game is still under development. Kindly answer THIS questionnaire and give suggestions for the game to improve. (questionnaire is in Bahasa Malaysia)

Aoky was created for my final year project on the topic "Act of Kindness". The main objective of this game is to promote random act of kindness on the player's behavior. The game include a series of checkpoint with dialog for the player to read the story. Multiple level will be added if the game get positive feedback.

Please leave positive feedback, I would like to hear them from you.

HOW TO PLAY

- Xbox Controller
- Keyboard's input :

  • WASD = Move Player
  • CTRL = Fly
  • Space = Jump or Enter
  • ESC = Pause
